ta.shape3D

Class Triangle3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • ta.shape3D.Triangle3D

  • public class Triangle3D
extends java.lang.Object
    Shape which used the ImmediateModeRenderer20 to draw, in OpenGL environment, a triangle
    Author:
    S Firegreen

      • getPointTexture1

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getPointTexture1()
        This Point Texture define the point of the image which corresponds to the first point of the triangle. the position (0,0) corresponds to the bottom left corner of the image.
        Returns:
        the first Point of the triangle

      • getPointTexture2

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getPointTexture2()
        This Point Texture define the point of the image which corresponds to the second point of the triangle. the position (0,0) corresponds to the bottom left corner of the image.
        Returns:
        the second Point of the triangle

      • getPointTexture3

        public com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 getPointTexture3()
        This Point Texture define the point of the image which corresponds to the third point of the triangle. the position (0,0) corresponds to the bottom left corner of the image.
        Returns:
        the third Point of the triangle

      • render

        public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.glutils.ImmediateModeRenderer20 rendu)
        draw the triangle in the OpenGL environment. The Color of triangle depends of the tree colors defined. If the colors is different, the color of the triangle will be a blend of these colors. If the TEXTURE_2D is enable, the texture which is defined will be displayed according to the textures points defined.
        Parameters:
        rendu - the renderer which is used for drawing triangle, you need to call the begin() method of this renderer before using this method.

      • save

        public void save(java.io.DataOutputStream bos)
        Save the object by using the stream defined
        Parameters:
        bos - the stream which will be use for saving the information of the triangle to load

        Parameters:

        Returns:
